description: After the overindulgence that comes with Thanksgiving, you might want to try something a little lighter and brighter with your leftover meat This is a version of sopa de lima, the restorative and delicious Mexican soup popular in the Yucatán It is usually made with chicken and a local lime, but turkey and supermarket lime are a magical, timely substitute.
title: Turkey Soup With Lime and Chile
title_page: Turkey Soup With Lime and Chile Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
After the overindulgence that comes with Thanksgiving, you might want to try something a little lighter and brighter with your leftover meat. This is a version of sopa de lima, the restorative and delicious Mexican soup popular in the Yucatán. It is usually made with chicken and a local lime, but turkey and supermarket lime are a magical, timely substitute.
Featured in: What Can I Make With Leftover Turkey Besides Sandwiches?.
Learn: How to Make Soup
